tools.name: Box Breathing (4-4-4-4)
tools.action: Grounding: Inhale 4s, Hold 4s, Exhale 4s, Hold 4s. Repeat 4 times to reset the nervous system.

tools.name: Control vs. Concern Audit
tools.action: Audit: Draw two columns. List stressors you can control vs. those you cannot. Cross out the 'cannot' column.

tools.name: Pre-Performance Scripting
tools.action: Drafting: Write down 3 'If/Then' scenarios for your upcoming task. (e.g., 'If I lose my place, then I will take a sip of water and reset.')

tools.name: High-Intensity Burst
tools.action: Output: Perform 30 seconds of maximum effort movement (shadow boxing or sprints) to burn off excess cortisol.
